name: part_003
file: tmp_大神ミオ２周年記念３Dライブ【2nd anniversary】 [mmUVwNut2-Y]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Ookami Mio talks to the audience while recovering from choking on cake.
Shirakami Fubuki joins as a guest, and they discuss the 'cake incident'.

subtitles.original: 深愛
subtitles.english: Deep Love (Shin'ai)

subtitles.original: ...んなも
subtitles.english: ...any [difficulty]

subtitles.original: 自分に問いかける
subtitles.english: I ask myself

subtitles.original: 突然走り出したゆめ
subtitles.english: A dream that suddenly started running

subtitles.original: 思いきり裂いて
subtitles.english: Searing through...

subtitles.original: すいません 放送事故が
subtitles.english: I'm sorry, a broadcast accident...

subtitles.original: 震えた声で
subtitles.english: With a trembling voice

subtitles.original: 許される日が来るならば
subtitles.english: If the day I'm forgiven comes

subtitles.original: もう一度伝えたいよ
subtitles.english: I want to tell you once more

subtitles.original: すいません
subtitles.english: I'm sorry

subtitles.original: 黙っていても届かない
subtitles.english: It won't reach even if I'm silent

subtitles.original: 声にしなきゃ動き出さなきゃ
subtitles.english: Must put it into words, must start moving

subtitles.original: 隠したままの二人の秘密
subtitles.english: The secret of the two of us kept hidden

subtitles.original: このまま忘れられてしまうの
subtitles.english: Will it be forgotten like this?

subtitles.original: だからね早く
subtitles.english: So, quickly

subtitles.original: 今ここに来て
subtitles.english: Come here now

subtitles.original: ケーキ食べすぎちまったかもしれねぇ
subtitles.english: I might've eaten too much cake...

subtitles.original: あなたのそばにいるだけで
subtitles.english: Just being by your side

subtitles.original: ただそれだけでよかった
subtitles.english: That alone was enough

subtitles.original: 今度巡り逢えたら
subtitles.english: If we can meet again next time

subtitles.original: もっともっと笑い合えるかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if we can laugh together more and more

subtitles.original: どんな時もどこにいる時でも
subtitles.english: No matter when, no matter where we are

subtitles.original: 強く強く抱きしめていて
subtitles.english: Hold me tight, tight

subtitles.original: 情熱より熱い熱で溶かして
subtitles.english: Melt it with heat hotter than passion

subtitles.original: 一つだけこの想いは全て
subtitles.english: This feeling is everything

subtitles.original: 終わりなどないと信じている
subtitles.english: I believe there is no end

subtitles.original: あなただけずっと見つめているの
subtitles.english: I'm only looking at you forever

subtitles.original: なま、なまだから、なまだから
subtitles.english: It's raw, because it's raw, because it's raw

subtitles.original: 生ケーキもなまだったけど
subtitles.english: The fresh cake was raw too, but

subtitles.original: なまだから
subtitles.english: Because it's raw...

subtitles.original: えっと、あ、ここであの
subtitles.english: Um, ah, at this point...

subtitles.original: すいませんあの
subtitles.english: I'm sorry, um...

subtitles.original: ちょっとこんな、こんなこと
subtitles.english: After this kind of, this kind of...

subtitles.original: こんなことになったあとなんですけどあの
subtitles.english: ...thing happening, but um...

subtitles.original: あの、ゲストがいます
subtitles.english: Um, there's a guest.

subtitles.original: えー、おーい！おーい！
subtitles.english: Eh, hey! Hey!

subtitles.original: キツネやーい！キツネやーい！
subtitles.english: Fox! Hey! Fox! Hey!

subtitles.original: 白上フブキ
subtitles.english: Shirakami Fubuki

subtitles.original: あ、いた。こんなとこにいた。
subtitles.english: Ah, there she is. She was in a place like this.

subtitles.original: キツネ！どうにかしてくれこの空気
subtitles.english: Fox! Do something about this atmosphere!

subtitles.original: もうどうしよううち
subtitles.english: What should I do?

subtitles.original: おめえ歌舞いの転換の時にケーキなんか食ってるからだろ
subtitles.english: That's because you were eating cake during the scene change!

subtitles.original: やっちまった！やっちまった！
subtitles.english: I messed up! I messed up!

subtitles.original: 食べたいとか言いながら、あげるもしなかったからだろ
subtitles.english: It's 'cause you said you wanted it but didn't even share, right?

subtitles.original: ごめん、ごめん、うちが全部一人で食べちゃったから
subtitles.english: Sorry, sorry, it's because I ate it all by myself.

subtitles.original: 大丈夫だよミアン、あ、ミオ、だって足元雪だからさ
subtitles.english: It's okay Mian—ah, Mio. I mean, there's snow at your feet.

subtitles.original: ケーキ白いからわかんない
subtitles.english: The cake is white, so you can't tell.

subtitles.original: 余計わかるだろうが！
subtitles.english: That makes it even more obvious!

subtitles.original: それはわかるよ
subtitles.english: I can tell that much.

subtitles.original: 大丈夫、見えない見えない
subtitles.english: It's fine, you can't see it, you can't see it.

subtitles.original: わかんないかな
subtitles.english: Can't you tell?

subtitles.original: 見えない、見えない大丈夫大丈夫。うん。
subtitles.english: Can't see it, can't see it, it's fine, it's fine. Yeah.

subtitles.original: あの、吐いてはないんですよ
subtitles.english: Um, I didn't throw up.

subtitles.original: 吐いてないね
subtitles.english: You didn't.

subtitles.original: ちょっと込み上げちゃった
subtitles.english: It just almost came up.

subtitles.original: そう、ごめん。後ろから見守るミオが咳き込んで「ミオ！」っつって
subtitles.english: Right, sorry. Watching Mio from behind, she coughed, and I went 'Mio!'

subtitles.original: 「大丈夫か」って小声で声が出ちゃったもん
subtitles.english: I even whispered 'Are you okay?' out loud.

subtitles.original: そうなんだよ。そう。リハーサル上手くいってたんだ
subtitles.english: That's right. Yeah. The rehearsal went so well.

subtitles.original: そう、リハーサルは、リハーサルはね、すごくね、よかったんだけどね
subtitles.english: Yeah, the rehearsal... the rehearsal was really great, but...

subtitles.original: ケーキ食うから。リハ食ってなかったやん、ケーキ
subtitles.english: It's because you ate cake. You didn't eat it during rehearsal!

subtitles.original: そうだね。あそこで食うからだよ
subtitles.english: True. It's 'cause you ate it then.

subtitles.original: まあまあ、これもね、ならではならでは
subtitles.english: Well, well, this is also unique to a live show.

subtitles.original: そうだね、ミオママ、面白かったよ
subtitles.english: Right, Mio-mama. It was funny.

subtitles.original: ちょっとあれはね、ちょっとえぐいやつやっちゃったね
subtitles.english: That was a bit of a nasty one I did there.

subtitles.original: カットされるかもしれない。普通にね放送してるときだったら
subtitles.english: It might get cut. If it were a normal broadcast...

subtitles.original: ボリューム絞って、レベルの咳だった
subtitles.english: ...that cough would be at a 'mute volume' level.

subtitles.original: そうだね。超豪華
subtitles.english: Right. It was super extravagant.

subtitles.original: そうですね。はい。
subtitles.english: Indeed. Yes.

subtitles.original: というわけで、本日、え、毎年ね、うちがね周年になると現れてくれる
subtitles.english: So, today... every year, on my anniversary, she appears...

subtitles.original: 白上フブキさんにお越しいただきましたー
subtitles.english: Please welcome Shirakami Fubuki-san!

subtitles.original: はーい、白上フブキです。ありがとう。
subtitles.english: Hi, I'm Shirakami Fubuki. Thank you!

subtitles.original: 「い」っていう文字が、シャープの半分みたいに
subtitles.english: The character 'i' looks like half of a sharp symbol.

subtitles.original: シャープ。本当だ。なかなかにね、あの見ないフォントだよね
subtitles.english: A sharp. You're right. It's quite a unique font, isn't it?

subtitles.original: そうだね。髪のところもなんか、短いし。まあでも可愛い。可愛いフォントの
subtitles.english: Yeah. The hair parts are short too. Well, it's a cute font.

subtitles.original: はい。というわけでね。まあ、ちょっとね、2周年記念ということでライブ
subtitles.english: Yes. So, anyway. This is my 2nd anniversary live concert.
